bhagyawath wu munindun udesa wu pada namaskara pujawen anathuruwa ,shyamopalika wanshika maha wihara parshawaye shrimath mahanayaka thibbatuwawe shri sumangala mahimipanan wahansege aashirwadayen, malwathu maha wihariya athigaru dimbaulkumbaure wimaladhamma anunayaka mahimipanan wahansege mulikathwayen, malwathu maha wihariya karaka sangha sabhika aithihasika ridi wihara bharakara thampath thibbatuwawe shri siddhartha buddharakkhitha nayaka mahimipanan wahanse, malwathu maha wihariya karaka sangha sabhika anuradhapura buddhashrawaka bhikshu wishwawidyalaye kathikacharyaya darshanapathi gaurawarha waliwita soratha nayaka mahimipanan wahanse, malwathu maha wihara parshawaye karma wagacharya rambaukwalle nandarama nayaka mahimipanan wahanse, mahanuwara shri sangharaja maha piriwene aacharya gaurawa shrasthrawedi wilgamuwe hemaloka swamindrayan wahanse, mahanuwara shri sangharaja maha piriwene aacharya rajakiya panditha gaurawa shrasthrawedi thambaarawa sumanananda panditha swaminwahanse saha shri lanka amarapura maha sangha sabhawe maha lekakhkadhikari gaurawarha aacharaya pallekande rathanasarabhidhana anunayaka mahimipanan wahanse athulu thrayi nikayika swamin wahansela 120 namak udesa maha sanghagatha dakshinawa pawathwanu labuwa.
